name: Haywire (itch) (ScalphaMission)
description:
An UNSTABLE dimensional has opened up near the old robot factory.
Evil bots are pouring in from an alternate dimension.

Get that factory up and running again to repel the bot invasion.

Select factory blueprints from the tool bar on the left (it scrolls)

Rotate objects with Q and E.

Deliver finished bots to the loading blocks.
